title: We're in the middle of a realignment: Carrie Dann, Mark Murray & Dante Chinni
description: As the vote continues to come in, Chuck is joined by the NBC News Political Unit to sift through what we've learned so far about the picture captured by the 2020 election.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
